title: Looking to trade for T206 PSA 4s
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Looking to trade for T206 PSA 4s
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Stephen
I am looking to trade for T206 PSA 4s, higher grade 1933 Goudeys (PSA 6-8), and Cal Ripken PSA 10s (1981-1992 only)

I have a variety of 1933 Goudeys mid grade (PSA 1-5s) that I would like to trade, such as 
#160 Lou Gehrig PSA 4 MK
(3) #1 Benny Bengough PSA 1 (and 1 PSA 2)
other low grade HOFs
and many PSA 5 Commons

Please let me know if you are interested I can provide scans. I don't mind trading multiple cards for one, but I am looking for fair value


Email Address: putman2110@yahoo.com
